lead_paragraph: A police report concluded that there had been a forcewide failure to address sexual abuse in the northern city of Rochdale, but that no police officer would face serious discipline.

headline.main: Police Failed to Address Sexual Abuse in Northern British City, Report Says

snippet: A police report concluded that there had been a forcewide failure to address sexual abuse in the northern city of Rochdale, but that no police officer would face serious discipline.
